description:
Are you enjoying life's great adventure or just enduring the daily grind?

Life can be crazy at times and often we don't take the time we need to think, to breathe and to find the calm in our world so that we can step back and truly enjoy our life.

The meditation techniques in this course will allow you to 'Stop', reconnect with your self and this will allow you to start living a happier, more fulfilling life!
title: Calming the Chaos - Powerful Mindfulness Meditations
